mapper.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS History ( id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, userId BIGINT NOT NULL, sourceLang TEXT NOT NULL, targetLang TEXT NOT NULL, sourceText TEXT NOT NULL, targetText TEXT NOT NULL, reflect TEXT NOT NULL, reflectText TEXT NOT NULL, createTime TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updateTime TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES User(id) ON DELETE CASCADE );
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO History (userId, sourceText, targetText, sourceLang,targetLang,reflect,reflectText) VALUES (#{userId}, #{sourceText}, #{targetText},#{sourceLang},#{targetLang},#{reflect},#{reflectText});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM History WHERE id = #{id} and userId=#{userId};
